title: Meghan Markle's half brother Tom pleads for royal wedding invite if she marries Prince Harry
text:
Meghan Markle's half brother Tom pleads for royal wedding invite if she marries Prince Harry He also wants to apologise to Suits star over recent a arrest drama. Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Meghan Markle ’s half brother has pleaded with the actress to give him a wedding invite if she ever marries Prince Harry. 
Suits star Meghan, 35, shares a father with Tom Markle Jr, 50. The siblings grew up together in California but later drifted apart over the years. 
Tom hit the headlines last week when he was accused of fighting with partner Darlene during a drunken row at their home. Thomas Wayne Markle was booked in Josephine County, Oregon Meghan grew up with Tom in California but they drifted apart (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Prince Harry 'declares his love' for another woman Share this video Watch Next 
But now he’s issued a new apology to Meghan, and asked she include him in any future royal wedding. 
“Marriage and kids is on the cards for Meghan and Harry and I still want to go to the wedding if they’ll let me,” said Tom in an interview with The Sun on Sunday . 
“Of course I want to go to London and Buckingham Palace. Their relationship has been going from strength to strength and this drama is the last thing I wanted to happen. 
“I want to tell Meghan I am truly sorry from the bottom of my heart. The last thing I would ever want to do is put a black mark on her situation with the royals.” Meghan is best known for her role in legal show Suits (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Tom’s partner Darlene added she’s also keen for a wedding invite, should Harry pop the question to his actress girlfriend. 
“I would love to meet the royals,” she said. “I’d buy the prettiest dress if Tom and I can go to Meghan’s wedding.” 
Tom was arrested by sheriff's officers in the US state of Oregon and charged with a number of gun offences earlier this month, after he was accused of holding a gun to partner Darlene's head. 
However, he has categorically denied holding the gun to her head. Meghan has been dating Prince Harry since last year, but they keep their romance low key (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Addressing the incident last weekend, Tom said: “I am incredibly sorry for my actions and I’m especially sorry to everyone affected by my drinking. I am seeking help and I promise I will be the best person I can be going forward. Thank you for understanding.” 
While his 24-year-old son Tyler added to The Sun: “He knows it is an embarrassment to Meghan and the family. He is very sorry and is apologising to everyone. He just needs some time to heal and reflect on life. But he wants to apologise for everything. He is in the spotlight now and everyone gets to see his flaws." 
Tom was arrested at a home in Grants Pass, Oregon, and booked into Josephine County Jail on three charges. Meghan pictured on a red carpet in 2012 (Photo: Rex Features) 
In a mugshot posted online following his arrest, he appeared red-faced and offered no expression. 
Tom was charged with menacing, pointing a firearm at another person and unlawful use of a weapon. 
He was held in jail overnight and released the following morning after cash bail was set at $1,500 - approximately £1,230. 
Tom called his ex-wife, Tracy Dooley, at 3am to ask her for cash to secure his release from custody, the Mail on Sunday reported. Meghan has not spoken out about Tom's address (Photo: Splash News) 
Deputy Jill Elardi said: "He was arrested at 11pm on January 12 and released on Friday at 10am. He will be going to court for it." 
Ms Dooley said Tom used to be very close to his sister Meghan but "there has been some separation over the years". 
She added: "I don’t want this to be embarrassing for Meghan. Tom has had a little fame and publicity since Meghan started dating Prince Harry. He wants what’s best for her. He is so happy and proud for her." Will Harry pop the question to Meghan? (Photo: AFP) 
Ms Dooley said her ex-husband has alcohol issues, sharing: "I hope this incident helps him get the help he needs to deal with alcohol issues he might have. All of his family love and support him and are very concerned about him. He needs to recognise if he has a problem and seek the help he needs." 
Tom previously said his father was "proud" of Meghan's relationship with the royal and claimed the 72-year-old had met the Prince in Toronto where Meghan lives. 
"My dad knew about [the relationship] from the start," he told DailyMail.com. 
Meghan and Harry have been pictured together in London several times since he confirmed they were dating and were recently rumoured to have enjoyed their first holiday together. Like us on Facebook
